ygData.subject: 2h Slashing vs. 1h Blunt
ygData.msgSnippet: I have recently gotten to the point where I can cap my 1H slashing but being a dwarf, I don t think I can keep both 2h slashing and 1h blunt up. Is summoning a
ygData.messageBody:
I have recently gotten to the point where I can cap my 1H slashing but being
a dwarf, I don't think I can keep both 2h slashing and 1h blunt up.

Is summoning a hammer really useful other than just using it as a magical
weapon before you can afford combine? I heard someone say that it is good
because you can summon one after to die to get your body back. How will it
help you if you have no armor though, you're running around naked with a
hammer.

I'm looking at 2h slashing but was wondering if anyone could tell me another
use for 1h blunt that might change my mind. Thanks for your time.

Gurtof, Dwarven knight of the 6th order.
